text: Eniko Kubinyi (born 1 August 1976) is a Hungarian biologist. She completed her Ph.D. degree in animal behaviour from the Eotvos Lorand University, where she is the principal investigator of the Senior Family Dog Project and the Canine Brain and Tissue Bank. In 2012 she appeared on the Horizon (BBC TV series) programme The Secret Life of the Dog. She is a fellow of the Young Academy of Europe and a founding member of the Hungarian Young Academy. == Bibliography == * List of publications at Google scholar === Books === *Author of 10 chapters The Dog - A Natural History ==References== == External links == * Young Academy of Europe * Department of Ethology Eotvos Lorand University profile Category:Eötvös Loránd University faculty Category:Ethologists Category:Hungarian biologists Category:Living people Category:1976 births
title: Eniko Kubinyi
